1.Name: Druid Summoner
1.Ability: SLOW Once per turn; you can deploy an 'Animal' unit of cost 1 or less from your hand or of cost 2 or less if an 'Animal' is in support

2.Name: Wolf Druid
2.Ability: 1PT, before attack; this unit can turn into a melee 'Dog Animal' unit and gains 2 total health or back into its original form losing 2 bonus health

3.Name: Druid King
3.Ability: Gains the power and ability of a supporting 'Animal'

4.Name: Recon Druid
4.Ability:
Grants HASTE  to an ‘Animal’ in support
Gains HASTE if an ‘Animal’ is in support

7.Name: Hunting Wolf
7.Ability: Gains 1 power for each other allied 'Dog'

8.Name: Cattle Dog
8.Ability: GOLD 1 Target enemy unit; Move target unit into a free zone in the same column as this card

9.Name: Pistol Shrimp
9.Ability: This unit's attacks cause the defending units next attack's damage to be reduced by 2

10.Name: Sea Captain
10.Ability:
Grants all 'Pirate' units you control RUSH
This unit gains power equal to your current gold

11.Name: Navigator
11.Ability:
While in support of a 'Ship' gains SCOUTING 
Supporting unit gains SCOUTING

12.Name: Cannoneer
12.Ability: Gain 3 power while there is a ship in support

13.Name: Hardened Chef
13.Ability: If there is a supporting 'Pirate' this unit gains 2 Health, If you control a 'Ship' instead all 'Pirate's gain 2 Health

14.Name: Crazy Samuel
14.Ability:
This unit gains abilities based on the sum of the 'Pirate's and 'Ship's you control; 2 or more: Gain 1 power 
3 or more: Gain HASTE 
4 or more: Gain an additional attack

15.Name: Black Eye
15.Ability:
PIERCING 
On Deployment; deal 3 damage to up to X enemies where X is the sum of ships you control or are in your grave

16.Name: Pirate Recruiter
16.Ability: On deployment; INVESTIGATE Unit 2, you may add a 'Pirate' from the revealed cards and if you control a ship reduce its cost by 1

17.Name: First Mate
17.Ability: This unit's cost is reduced by 1 if you control a 'Pirate Leader' All 'Pirate' units gain 1 power if you control a ship

18.Name: Pirate Apprentice
18.Ability:
Cost 0 while you control a 'Ship'
When another pirate attacks; Gain 1 power until end

19.Name: Ghastly terror
19.Ability: On deploy; This unit gains Power and health equal to the number of units in both graveyards

20.Name: Rugged skeleton
20.Ability: When a unit you control (except 'Rugged Skeleton') is sent to grave; You can summon this card to the zone of that unit

21.Name: Bulging Spawn
21.Ability: When this unit is sent from field to grave; place up to 2 1G 2/1 Melee 'Undead' units in free zones.

23.Name: Soulless Pillager
23.Ability: Whenever another unit you control is sent to the grave; gain gold equal to half of its cost. (Round up)

24.Name: Exploding Zombie
24.Ability: If this unit is sent to the grave, target enemy; deal 2 damage to it

25.Name: The Butcher
25.Ability: GOLD 1 (0 if the opponent controls more units) When this unit is deployed; Sacrifice a unit, the opponent sacrifices a unit with lowest health (your choice if tied)

26.Name: Skeleton Archer
26.Ability: Before draw, if this card is in the graveyard and you have a unit hand; discard it and play this card

27.Name: Runner
27.Ability:
HASTE 
If this unit was deployed from the grave it gains +1 power

28.Name: Gravedigger
28.Ability: On deploy; INVESTIGATE unit 3, destroy a unit investigated, G1 Deploy that unit before destroying it

29.Name: Cultist Mimic
29.Ability: When this unit is deployed; You may play a spell from your grave then exile it. If it is a 'Oath' spell you may play it for free.

30.Name: Group Caster
30.Ability:
Oath' spells cost 1 less (min 1) while you control another 'Cultist'
You can sacrifice this and 2 other units; Play a dragon unit from your deck

31.Name: Spell Hoarding Dragon
31.Ability: On deploy; You can bottom stack any number of Spells in your grave, this unit gains 1 Power and 1 Health per spell

32.Name: Cursed Fighter
32.Ability: When a spell is played; Gain 1 power until the end of the turn
